snippet: Freedom Place, which opened last month near Houston, is the state’s first privately run safe house for American girls who have been victims of sex trafficking.
lead_paragraph: Freedom Place, which opened last month near Houston, is the state’s first privately run safe house for American girls who have been victims of sex trafficking.

headline.seo: Freedom Place, Near Houston, Provides Shelter for Young Sex Trafficking Victims
headline.main: A Shelter for Victims of Sex Trafficking Offers Counseling, Schooling and Safety
headline.print_headline: A Shelter for Victims of Sex Trafficking Offers Counseling, Schooling and Safety
